subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tim Wakefield allowed three hits in seven shutout innings yesterday as the Boston Red Sox pounded the White Sox’ pitching for a third consecutive game in Chicago in a 14-2 win. Wakefield joined his teammate Josh Beckett at a major league-leading 16 victories.
